title: Thunderbird freezes/hangs (Mac)
content: Thunderbird freezes/hangs on restart (mac OS 15.4), including in safe mode. I've updated to 137.0.2 from 129 and the same problem occurs. It only displays "Looking up gmail.com" and I get the spinning disk of doom and have to do a force quit…
creator: james.d.gifford

title: local folders
content:
I have many subfolders under Local Folders, and have been using popfile for years to sort my mail into the correct folder. But popfile is hasn't been supported for a long time and has stopped working for some of my email accounts. I created new pop3 accounts instead of using popfile's proxy to categorize the emails before they reach the inbox. Those pop3 accounts now have their own inboxes separate from the one under local folders and their own sets of message filters. I can use those message rules to move mail into the local folders, but I want to remove the popfile specific rules and use the same new non-popfile specific message filter for all accounts. instead of having to duplicate the message filters for each account.

Can all accounts be configured to use the local folders inbox and the same message filter? How? I have enabled the account column so I can tell which account received each message. It's been many years since I set up Thunderbird & I don't remember how I did it when Outlook Express went away. Can the junk filter be used to classify emails into more than junk/notjunk categories?
creator: Bill_Stuntz

title: Convert e-mail to Event - creat event from e-mail
content: 137.0.2 (64-bit) Windows 11 Since upgrading to this latest version the functionality of Convert email to Event/Task does not respond on my machines. When selected from More>Convert to>Event there is no response and no save event window that used to open. Has any-one else reported this problem and is there any work-around? Thank you
creator: jwelstead

title: Thunderbird emails

title: Can receive but not send
